title: left-facing fist: dark skin tone

nouns: The raised fist is a symbol of solidarity and support.
Hand with the fingers curled into the palm
The closed hand with the fingers on the palm.
A fist is an action where a hand has the fingers curled into the palm and the thumb retracted, displaying the knuckles.
A hand that has the fingers curled into the palm and the thumb retracted, displaying the knuckles
Hand with the fingers clenched or curled inward
A hand with the fingers clenched in the palm (as for hitting)

description: This version of the  Left-facing Fist emoji has the  Dark Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Black Skin Tone on supported platfo
apple_vendor_description: The left-facing fist emoji on Apple devices, rendered with a rich, deep skin tone, projects a strong and resolute gesture. Its form is sculpted with Apple's characteristic 3D shading, giving it a rounded, substantial feel and a subtle sheen that emphasizes its power.  On Apple devices, this emoji conveys solidarity, support, or a determined stance, often used in contexts of empowerment and agreement.
